state_summary: Programmable optics startup Lumotive adds Amazon and ITHCA Group as investors to its Series B round, bringing total funding to $59 million.
evidence: Lumotive has raised more than $100 million in venture capital to date.
The company's Light Control Metasurface solid-state chips can be controlled electronically to bend and manipulate light.
Lumotive's tech is a proven technology in the field, with potential use cases including autonomous vehicles sensing their surroundings.
keywords: Lumotive, Amazon, ITHCA Group, Series B funding
